item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Jazz isn't dead. It just smells funny." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Information is not knowledge. Knowledge is not wisdom. Wisdom is not truth. Truth is not beauty. Beauty is not love. Love is not music. Music is THE BEST." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Without music to decorate it, time is just a bunch of boring production deadlines or dates by which bills must be paid." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "If you want to get laid, go to college. If you want an education, go to the library." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Definition of rock journalism: People who can't write, doing interviews with people who can't think, in order to prepare articles for people who can't read." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "There is more stupidity than hydrogen in the universe, and it has a longer shelf life." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Communism doesn't work because people like to own stuff." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Interviewer: 'So Frank, you have long hair. Does that make you a woman?' Frank Zappa: 'You have a wooden leg. Does that make you a table?" -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Art is making something out of nothing, and selling it." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Music is the only religion that delivers the goods." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Some scientists claim that hydrogen, because it is so plentiful, is the basic building block of the universe. I dispute that. I say there is more stupidity than hydrogen, and that is the basic building block of the universe." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Andreas add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders
